title: Does animated SVGs work?
body: Please let me know. I can't find anything about it except for the creator of XamSvg telling that it has support for it but I can't try the examples as I haven't bought it.

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
Not at this time.

Closing this here as it is better served on https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp.Extended/issues/10
